name: Soul Battles - Puzzle Game
description:
Welcome to Soul Battles, a block puzzle game where only the strongest Souls survive.
Let your story unfold as you solve a unique endless matching puzzle game, build worlds, and battle your friends in an epic block puzzle adventure. Soul Battles introduces a new style of match or blast puzzles and combines it with competitive multiplayer gameplay. As you solve an endless challenging puzzle, you will build the worlds in each Soul Battles chapter and unleash abilities to attack or raid your friends’ worlds.

A block puzzle game unlike any other!
Remember that classic arcade puzzle game where tiles in different shapes fell from the top and you had to play them where they fit? Soul Battles is like that, just way better!
- Match your way through an endless addictive puzzle game.
- Place matching tiles on the puzzle board in a complete row to remove them.
- Each row you remove gives you rewards, power-ups, and chances to attack and raid other players around the world!
- Endless possibilities on one puzzle board. Choose your moves quickly, but wisely.

Is your Soul good or evil?
Each move you make on the puzzle board will determine your next move against, or with, your friends and foes.
- Take revenge and Attack your friends’ world or lend a helping hand and conquer the world along with them.
- Pile up your treasure and Steal coins from other players. You snooze, you lose!

Unravel the tale of Soul
- As you match and solve puzzles, you will earn coins to build the many different chapters in the story of Soul Battles.
- Each chapter has its own unique world, characters, and landmarks
- Collect shields from the puzzle board to keep your world protected from attacks from other players.

New features coming soon!
- Challenge Bar with daily missions and rewards.
- Epic prize wheel with huge rewards!
- New chapters to build and explore.

Only the strongest souls survive in Soul Battles. Do you have what it takes?
